document.title: Overtime and the Police: Application of the Overtime Provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act on Law Enforcement
document.abstract: This publication is an overview of the impact of the Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) overtime provisions on law enforcement agencies.
